mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.Teacher_name as TeacherName ,a.Teacher_phone as TeacherPhone ,a.Teacher_photo as TeacherPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.Teacher_email as TeacherEmail ,a.Teacher_shanchang as TeacherShanchang ,a.Teacher_lvli as TeacherLvli ,a.Teacher_content as TeacherContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM Teacher a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.Teacher_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.TeacherName},'%')
and a.Teacher_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.TeacherPhone},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.Teacher_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.TeacherEmail},'%')
and a.Teacher_shanchang like CONCAT('%',#{params.TeacherShanchang},'%')
and a.Teacher_lvli like CONCAT('%',#{params.TeacherLvli},'%')
and a.Teacher_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.TeacherContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
